channel.title: Having some trouble.. Help!
channel.description:
Okay i have a server source, and a client i want to run, but i Dont have the right enviroment variables. I accidentally completley erased the code that i needed that was there, so could someone please give me the code to fix this error: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rrjk9u.jpg[/img]
I have JDK 6 Update 11
I also put in the following codes that people have told me to put in already To my enviromental variables with still no results:
Title: CLASSPATH Code: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk5.6.0_11\bin
Title: RSPP Compiler Code: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
Any help please?

item.title: Having some trouble.. Help!
item.dc:creator: @driger driger
item.description:
@driger wrote:

Okay so now i have my code changed to this:

Title: CLASSPATH

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0-11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

now i have this error:

item.title: Having some trouble.. Help!
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

It should have been 1.6.0-11, tehee, that should fix it :P.

Read full topic
